message.weightless.disconnect: Server to client config mismatch for Weightless! Please update your configuration file's common settings to match those of the server
weightless.midnightconfig.title: Common Config
weightless.midnightconfig.altitude: The altitude from which to provide flight buffs
weightless.midnightconfig.reduceHungerWh: Whether flying should be less exhausting at the specified altitude
weightless.midnightconfig.highHungerRedu: By how much flight exhaustion should be reduced
weightless.midnightconfig.movementSpeedA: Whether a player's movement attribute should affect their flight speed
weightless.midnightconfig.increaseSpeedW: Whether flying should be faster at high altitudes
weightless.midnightconfig.highSpeedMulti: By how much flight speed should be increased
weightless.midnightconfig.armorAffectSpe: Whether a player's armor attribute should reduce their flight speed
weightless.midnightconfig.itemAffectSpee: Whether using items should slow a player down when flying
weightless.midnightconfig.preventRangedW: Whether a player should be unable to use ranged weapons when flying
weightless.midnightconfig.increaseKnockb: Whether a player should receive increased knockback when flying
weightless.midnightconfig.knockbackMulti: By how much knockback should be increased
weightless.midnightconfig.shouldStun: Whether receiving damage should stun a player while flying
weightless.midnightconfig.damageRequirem: The threshold any received damage must pass to stun a player mid-flight
weightless.midnightconfig.renderSpeedlin: Whether sprinting while flying should display speed lines
weightless.midnightconfig.renderTrail: Whether airborne players should display a speed trail
weightless.midnightconfig.trailRed: The red value of your trail
weightless.midnightconfig.trailGreen: The green value of your trail
weightless.midnightconfig.trailBlue: The blue value of your trail
